title: Covid: 'We're not looking forward to doing it all again'
description: St George's Hospital in London is bracing for another wave of Covid in the wake of the Omicron variant.

title: How Russia tries to censor Western social media
description: Western social media companies face huge fines as Russia pressures them to remove content it objects to.

title: Omicron: Gig tickets, Covid and Christmas - can I get a refund?
description: What options do you have if you're thinking twice about going to events in the run-up to Christmas?

title: Burnley's Pastor Mick: ‘If I lock this door, he dies’
description: Emergency mental health referrals are soaring in East Lancashire - and in Burnley, former drug dealer Pastor Mick is offering a lifeline to those who can't always get the support they need.
